title: Kaiadas Spelaion
description: The Kaiadas cave is located near modern Trypi in the Peloponnese. Ancient testimony identifies it as a place of execution used by the ancient Spartans. Exploration in the modern era identified a significant number of skeletal remains, but these have not been effectively dated.

properties.description: Coordinates determined in Google Earth with reference to GeoHack and GPS coordinates visible in Tavis Travels 2021 video.
properties.title: Imagery location of Cave of Caiada
